div1.p: I've just rec'd a long report from Enot by special delivery. She was eager to get news to me for decision before tomorrow, altho' she must be on the way back now. Good old Lady! You are in a quandary for sure. There's only one right way at the moment. You two should stay at Mrs. Henderson's, maybe as much as a week more, than your board out. I want to pay Mrs. H if she will allow one the privilege. There's a good woman truly, as I knew before. But this will be your job. Work on those doctors to get Mama back home, If it is physically feasible at all to get her home, she should be there. They cannot stop her to "forget about it". She may be silent, but the desire will be there as in a dream, and it can do her no good. Once at home, with a good nurse & you children to cheer her, she will get a strong lift - or at least it seems very reasonable that she will. I don't care what it costs to help Mama out of her trouble - but I want it to be for Mama.

I expect to spend all ^the cash I have and ^some more, and I'm thoroughly adjusted to idea of doing that; but I suspect postulates and undertakes for the same reason. So you are delegated to keep after those doctors - with tact, of they cannot but think of me as good pay - and I am. Do you think they would hold Art Combs wife overlong - or even long enough? I'm not better at all, kids - really not. I just want to be sensible and do the right thing for all of us; and I want Mama to be where she wants to be as soon as she can be taken there. Don't worry, though. I can pay cash and It won't hurt our affairs long, I"m so deeply grateful that we actually have the money for this. I'll write Shahans to look after the peace. Is there a boy hired to wow? I understood so. You are all wonderful children, and Mama and I are extremely fortunate in having you. Love always, Dad.

You'll need to hang on to the cash you have for your expenses, & I know you'll take care of it. You may go to an occasional movie, of course. More soon to be unhappy - it won't help. I'll take care of youdall's the idea bout taking Mama home is this. She wants, very naturally, upon having you two there. At home you'd be together. As for moving her, consider the easy riding of a an up-to-date ambulance, and the fact that I'd pay what it costs to drive slowly and carefully. Powl out to the docs that it is wrong to have the whole family

closer.signed: spent up like this if there is any way to make a sensible, coherent pattern out of this chaos.
